name: POSSESSIONS [Domatophobia]
description:
The House compels you to do inventory of your possessions.

Do not acknowledge that which did not previously exist.

---

This game was made for Fear Jam 11, hosted by The LoafGuy. Big thanks to The LoafGuy for the inspiration!

---

Note: this game is currently only playable windowed at a resolution of 1920x1440. I'm working on fixing this. I might also add another room in the future.
